title: The Mill on the Floss - can be inferred that vicar

content.prompt: It can be inferred that the vicar mentioned in the sixth sentence was

choices.label: not very well regarded by female parishioners
too impractical to keep the church on a sound financial footing

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
